attributes.action: Aid to pay all household bills, living expenses and finances or pause them.
attributes.additional_details: To either pay all of the household bills, living expenses and finances so people don’t fall into debt and stress!
attributes.background: We would all like to have the feeling of security of our bills such as all household bills, living expenses and finances.

rejection.details:
We think these petitions are similar:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302256
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302284
